original_title: SJB wants No Confidence on Keheliya debated this week
original_body_lines: The Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) which brought a No Confidence motion on incumbent Minister of Health Keheliya Rambukwella, wants a debate this week.
SJB National Organizer and Member of Parliament Tissa Attanayake said his party will push for the debate on the no faith motion immediately.
“We want the motion debated in Parliament immediately as there is no reason for its delay,” Attanayake told journalists.
“The  motion is really an expression of displeasure on the country’s entire health sector and not a mere denouncing of the subject minister,” he added. (Yohan Perera)
